mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_BIRTH, AGREE_STATE, SIGN_IN) VALUES (MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberBirth}, #{agreeState}, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO MEMBER_LOG (MEMBER_LOG_NO, MEMBER_ID, SIGN_UP) VALUES (MEMBER_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
